ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:49:02 [Issue ID 4000-172025] urn:comicvine:4000-172025 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:14:38. [Issue ID 711165]
ComicInfo.Summary: Meriem, Bruce, Prof. Cook, and Kylde are on trip to a newly discovered tar pit. While there, they run into an absolutely humongous savaging mass of furious fire eating ants! Marshville seems to be directly in their way and Meriem and crew better do something to save their friends from being torn apart, but what can be done against the threat of the red menace?
